###

Hi, my name is Shimeng. I'm currently a PhD candidate in Statistics at the University of Copenhagen under the supervision of [Niklas Pfister](niklaspfister.github.io) and [Jonas Peters](http://web.math.ku.dk/~peters/). I'm a member of the [Copenhagen Causality Lab](https://cocala.github.io/) (CoCaLa).


### News

- I started an internship with Novo Nordisk in Copenhagen, Denmark from Apr. 2024.
- I did a data scientist internship with Google France (Sep.-Nov. 2023) in Paris, France.
- I presented a poster at [EMS 2023](https://ems2023.org/) (June 19-22) in Warsaw, Poland.
- I gave an oral presentation at [NORDSTAT 2023](https://nordstat2023.org/) (June 19-22) in Gothenburg, Sweden.
- I received the Student Travel Award and presented at the [ICSDS 2022](https://sites.google.com/view/icsds2022) in Florence, Italy.
